means: (pl. Oneida,Oneidas)奥奈达人（美国纽约州、威斯康星州的印第安人）

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Iroquoian people formerly living east of Lake Ontario
2. the Iroquoian language spoken by the Oneida people

auth_sentence.content: So obnoxious that it took residents of Oneida County seven years of forest burning to purge the stink.
auth_sentence.res_content: So obnoxious that it took residents of Oneida County seven years of forest burning to purge the stink.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So obnoxious that it took residents of Oneida County seven years of forest burning to purge the stink.
